alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 7:08AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northern Madison, southeastern Lincoln and southwestern Franklin Counties through 745 AM CST... At 707 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms extending from Moores Mill to Skyline, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts of 30 to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Moores Mill, Redstone Arsenal, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Stevenson, Huntland, Skyline and Gurley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
